name: Steady B
description: '''Warren Sabir McGlone''' (born September 17, 1969), known by the stage name '''Steady B''', is an American hip hop [[rapping|emcee]] who, along with [[Schoolly D]], the [[Will Smith|Fresh Prince]], and [[Three Times Dope]], was one of the first wave of Philadelphia-area emcees to gain notoriety in the mid-to-late 1980s. Steady B was a member (and ''de facto'' leader) of Philadelphia's Hilltop Hustlers crew. His musical career was relatively short-lived, and he is currently serving a [[Life imprisonment|life sentence]] in a [[List of Pennsylvania state prisons|Pennsylvania state prison]] for his role in the murder of [[Philadelphia Police Department|Philadelphia Police]] officer [[Murder of Lauretha Vaird|Lauretha Vaird]] during a botched bank robbery in 1996.
